name: Day Dream
description:
Submission for the second annual Fitchburg State Fall Game Jam.

Day Dream is a top down coop-competitive exploration game where players race to gather enough pieces of an artifact to get their wish. Players explore a mysterious island where one step in the dark is a recipe for certain death, and the dead stick around to haunt those that remain alive, or in the case of the squad's dog, just having fun chasing the other team members.

This game is operating off of the Photon online multiplayer framework, and will be receiving steady updates in the future.
